titleInfo.title: Billy Grammar at the Williams County Fair

mods.abstract: Two color window card (black and red on white) announcing the WSM Grand Ole Opry star Bill Grammer with his Troupe at the Williamson County Fairgrounds on July 14 and 15. Poster features a metal photoplate of Billy Grammer.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
recordInfo.recordOrigin: Record has been transformed into MODS v3.5 from a Qualified Dublin Core record by the Digital Library of Tennessee, a service hub of the Digital Public Library of America.
